name: BrompheniraminePhenylephrine
title: Brompheniramine / Phenylephrine
purpose: (Clinical Focus: This value set contains concepts that represent brompheniramine / phenylephrine combination medications.),(Data Element Scope: This value set may use the Quality Data Model (QDM) datatype related to Medication, Ordered.),(Inclusion Criteria: Includes only relevant concepts associated with semantic clinical drugs (concepts associated with component, form and strength); generic; human use only; prescribable; brompheniramine / phenylephrine (combination medication).),(Exclusion Criteria: Excludes branded drugs; components or ingredient only; non-prescribable; brompheniramine / phenylephrine in combination with other medications.)

contains.display: brompheniramine maleate 1.2 MG/ML / phenylephrine hydrochloride 2 MG/ML Oral Suspension
brompheniramine maleate 1 MG / phenylephrine hydrochloride 2.5 MG Chewable Tablet
brompheniramine maleate 4 MG / phenylephrine hydrochloride 10 MG Oral Tablet
brompheniramine maleate 0.8 MG/ML / phenylephrine hydrochloride 2 MG/ML Oral Solution
